name: P-trinity
description: P-Trinity, a Hong-Kong-based company, offers marketing consultation, marketing capability training and leadership coaching, acting as a partner to some of the world’s biggest brands. We deliver the best practice programs at a large scale (both in range of content and extent of delivery). We do this by collaborating with a tight network of trusted partners with whom we have worked with for a number of years. We tailor the team to meet each specific client brief, flexing the involvement of our people over time, depending on the requirements of the brief. We have used this approach to set up marketing academies and to deliver successful training programs to some of the world’s largest multi-nationals and to small independent organisations – all with varying learning needs and across a range of industries. P-Trinity works with clients like Unilever, Suntory-PepsiCo, Kimberly-Clark, Rotterdam School of Management at Erasmus University, and ESADE Business School in Barcelona.
features: We have over 20 years of global expertise working in various markets
Our diverse team is flexible and supportive with experts available on demand
We offer affordable cost models to cater to a range of budgets
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency

enhanced_description: P-Trinity is a Hong Kong-based consultancy specializing in marketing consultation, marketing capability training, and leadership coaching. With over 20 years of global expertise across various markets, they partner with leading brands and organizations worldwide. They deliver tailored, large-scale best practice programs, including setting up marketing academies and providing comprehensive training. Their approach involves collaborating with a network of trusted partners and offering flexible, on-demand expert teams to meet specific client briefs. P-Trinity caters to a wide range of clients, from large multi-nationals to small independent organizations, offering affordable cost models. Their services encompass brand consulting, marketing training course design, and marketing strategy.
